title: Beta Client
body:
Is there a way to go back to the original League of Legends client after updating it to the (New Beta Client?)
I'm having so much issues with it...it's buggy, its super glitchy, slow, etc. 110% hate it.

replies.body: {{item:3142}} {{item:3142}} {{item:3142}} {{item:3142}} {{item:3142}} {{item:3142}} {{champion:119}} {{champion:119}} {{champion:119}}  game of shit i h8 it because i cant download a new client

> [{quoted}](name=rch123,realm=EUNE,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=7YKH8ucz,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2016-11-24T17:49:25.233+0000)
>
> {{item:3142}} {{item:3142}} {{item:3142}} {{item:3142}} {{item:3142}} {{item:3142}} {{champion:119}} {{champion:119}} {{champion:119}}  game of shit i h8 it because i cant download a new client

DON'T download it cause you're going to crash

There sure is! Right on the login screen for the Beta client, there's an option to launch the Legacy Client. Additionally, you can launch the *lol.client.admin.exe* file from your installation locale (C:\Riot Games\League of Legends) to launch directly into the Legacy Client. Below is a screenshot of the login screen option.

https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/article_attachments/215576628/Launch-Legacy-Client.jpg

Let me know if you have any questions.
